title: Green Fusion Foodbar
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Indian, International, Italian, Buffet, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: A vegan restaurant serving hearty world cuisine including dishes from India, Africa, the Middle-East, Asia, Latin America and Europe. Gluten free options available daily. Restaurant is designed and decorated by hand and reflects a multi-cultural profile. As of November 2014, plans to hold film clubs about different cultures, to host presentations about sustainability and veganism and others. Gay-friendly.
